body_content.explanation: ways that a company can encourage customers to like it and buy from it, for example by using software to look at information it has about its customers and by using social media:
examples: Customer relationship management, or CRM, has been a hot topic since the early 1990s, when database-driven systems began to help companies gather better data on their customers.
Banks spend heavily on customer relationship management (CRM) systems to predict customer defections.
